name: Rolly Poly (PiterGroot)
description:
Play in fullscreen or download the game for the best experience.

Battle in a cute tower defense game, where you are a friendly dice named Poly. You must slay all other evil dice.

A tower costs 100 coins. To place a tower right click with your mouse and roll the dice! You get a random tower out of 6 everytime you roll.

Programming: Piter Groot

Art: GerbenErben

Controls:

Place tower = right mouse click

Movement = WASD

Melee attack = left mouse click
